website_summaries.verdict: This mid-priced wok is ideal for stir-frying smaller meals for one or two people.
pros: Safe for dishwasher and oven (at moderate temps)
cons: Some complaints about nonstick coating durability
Not ideal for magnetic induction stove tops

customer_reviews.title: Nice wok when its new, but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice size wok good while it is new. but it doesn't last. I bought one a year ago, on average I probably use maybe 2 times/week, so after about 100 times use (each time 2-5 minutes to make pan fried veggies), the protection layers all faded away and bottom no longer even. the Life Time warranty is a joke, first you have to pay to mail it back (which is almost $30+) and unless you can prove the wok is leak or soothing they consider it is "usable" so if you need a wok for a year then it's ok, but you can find a lot cheaper ones for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Much, much smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: Listed as a 10 inch bottom, but it is only 5. Top described as 12 inches but is only 10.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best Wok!!
customer_reviews.text: I've cooked using a wok for many years. I've had numerous woks of varying sizes, and from different manufacturers. This wok rises above them all! "It" cooks evenly, sears perfectly, and cleans without any effort at all. The size is smaller than I am used to, but works perfectly when cooking for between two and three people. For the price, and performance, you will be hard pressed to find a better wok.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Zef

customer_reviews.title: Actual rim measure is 10 3/4 so do NOT order the 10inch Calphon lid -- it is smaller than the pan rim!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed as a 10 inch pan -- but it measures 10 and 3/4 inches across the rim. This means the 10inch glass lid recommended to go with it DOES NOT FIT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol In FL

customer_reviews.title: This wok is great.. It's just the right size for stir ...
customer_reviews.text: This wok is great.. It's just the right size for stir fry dinner for 2 or 3 people. It's nice and heavy with a very flat bottom. It works well on a smooth or glass top stove. Non-stick coating initially seems durable. Price was good in comparison to other similar items. The handle stays cool on the stove top. If needed, it's oven proof since the handle is metal.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: After merely about a year, the none stick coating starting peel off. Received no responses from the seller after leaving two messages by calling for the number posted by seller. Will not buy it, had I known such a bad quality of the wok and no customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty fried rice at home
customer_reviews.text: I love this Wok. I make fried rice more often now since it turns out very good in this Wok. I also use this Wok to make south Indian sauteed vegetables so I am eating more veggies now. Head distribution is even, but it wont get as hot as a traditional wok (which is ok for me). Very easy to clean, it is dishwasher safe but I handwash it because it is so easy to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Balu Vellanki

customer_reviews.title: Most. Versatile. Pan. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: My family has had one of these for years (maybe a decade), but it was very scratched and chipped after very heavy use. I missed this pan on Amazon and bought a "similar" wok (what a mistake). Finally, after searching more carefully, I found this -- it's the exact same pan, but smooth and new! We cook /everything/ with it. It's so versatile and the new pan reminds me why I loved the old one so much. I wouldn't call it a wok, though. Its flat bottom acts more like a standard nonstick frying pan, but it's high, rounded sides make it wok-like. We use it for fried dumplings, tofu, large batches of pasta sauce, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Beeby

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, on the smaller size for stir fry ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, on the smaller size for stir fry pans but it was purchased as a 16 year olds first pan so for her purpose it is perfect. As new cook she will surely get many good years of use from it! The Contemporary Calphalon series does not disappoint as it has even heating, easy to clean, durable, heavy elegant cookware! I would recommend this item to most!
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love this wok
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. I’ve owned a 14” steel wok for decades that is excellent for cooking larger amounts of food. I now have a smaller stove so this is perfect for a couple of people or side dishes. I always advised against nonstick woks, but this works beautifully for a number of occasions without the size and weight of its older brother, and cleanup is quick. This makes a great companion wok I use frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Storming Bunnies

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife at her request, since her old one had the non-stick coating peeling off. This is perfectly sized for cooking enough food for 2-4 people, yet small enough to not collect dust in the cabinet. I wish it had a lid, but we manage with other lids from other cookware. It heats nicely, is sturdy, cleans really fast and even our chef friends that come over to use it end up commenting on how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Stefanko

customer_reviews.title: For small amounts, it's great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm cooking for myself and this small wok is a great size for smaller than family size meals. I find myself using it more frequently than a frying pan. I haven't had it long so I can't speak to it's durability. It does clean easily and the non-stick surface is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: geetumor

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it and uses it frequently!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a 2019 Christmas present for my “Boston Daughter” who is “setting up House” in her new condo! She is an excellent and an adventurous Cook! She loves it and has been apparently been “wok-ing up a storm” since Christmas! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Noel-Cushenberry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too small
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with the other reviewers, this is a very small Wok. Will work for small dishes and the quality appears to be very good. However, in my opinion, a small wok kind of defeats the purpose of using a wok, as your mixing many ingredients and flavors.....
customer_reviews.author: JoeD

customer_reviews.title: Love this wok
customer_reviews.text: I did not want a large wok to hassle washing and take up too much cabinet space but I was afraid this one was going to be too small. It is bigger than I thought it would be and the perfect size wok for my family of 4. It is easy to wash in the sink and small enough for storage to not be a problem. Like my Calphalon frying pans, the wok gets hot enough to put a sear on my vegetables without overcooking them.
customer_reviews.author: lilykai

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised - good performance and value, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on a ceramic range for a couple of months, and it behaved very well. The non-stick surface works (for now), and heat conduction is good. It feels fairly substantial without being too heavy. The handle is securely bolted and I don't see it getting loose anytime soon. Lastly - I've put this in the dishwasher after every use, and it came out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dor A.

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this pan for a while now and love it. Easy to use one handed. Takes a while to heat up and I have to keep the stove pretty high up but that’s to be expected with the thickness and size. Nothing negative to report here.
customer_reviews.author: Kohalaman

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok
customer_reviews.text: Handle stays cool even when the pot is very hot. Works perfectly and makes great dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size wok
customer_reviews.text: I had an old iron wok that had to sit on a base when I cooked. This pans is just big enough for a meal for 2-4 people, is easy to clean and stays put on the range while you are stir frying. The small handle on other side is a nice addition and makes it easy to move the pan from the range to the counter. So great not to have to oil my wok after every use. HHighly recommend this pan
customer_reviews.author: Colette C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Perfect Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is so easy to clean. My wife loves to do stir fry once a week and she loves it. I do the cleanup and I love it. What more can you want. Forget anything else when it comes to a wok. This is the best
customer_reviews.author: Warren C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This an is so easy to clean and cooks the food evenly . I made the mistake and bought an off brand pan/wok and it rusted and was hard to clean. Needless to say sometimes you have to get better quality products and this is one of those times.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Arrived when predicted. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an early Christmas gift for my sister, she is so picky. Once she said she liked it and wanted one, that was a done deal. It arrived when predicted. She loved it out of the box and used it to cook dinner that night. She loves the high sides, reduces splatter on the stove. I don't think it is heavy but she is a little weaker than me, hence the lower rating on the weight. She would reccomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Poweezy

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick wok, great for stir-frying.
customer_reviews.text: Heat was even, not too hot to charcoal the meat in a sudden, just the sweet spot of stir frying. And great that it's perfectly non-stick in every spot. And lightweight. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: scarlettsan

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the size
customer_reviews.text: The Calphaon pan is ok but the diameter of the bottom is so small that it doesn’t completely cover the smallest burner in our Samsung electric stove. On the whole, it is too small for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Peter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wok. It’s the only one I’ve ever had that doesn’t rust or degrade and is super easy to clean! I stick it in the dishwasher and everything comes right off of it because of the super high quality non-stick surface. Love it, because I hate washing pots by hand. Lasts forever, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Soto-Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Can I still use them ?
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I like your pots and pans very much. There is a whole set of your pots and pans in our house, but now they are like this, can I still use them ?
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Handle too heavy, wok bowl too thin no front handle
customer_reviews.text: Overall this thing is too heavy to not have a front handle. It doesn’t heat evenly on our gas top and is outdone by a cheaper European furniture store brand wok.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Wok for One
customer_reviews.text: I like to cook Chinese and for years I've used a large steel wok. It required cleaning of course. Recently I bought this nonstick wok, smaller than my pro size wok. It saves me time, takes up less space, and my food tastes fine. It also sits squarely on my electric stove.
customer_reviews.author: Casan

customer_reviews.title: Jaw dropping performance, excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite ; easy to clean, easy to use, bye-bye old pots and pan ( except for my favorite pot), I'm getting the whole set!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Doe

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Had it for over 6 month now and used it almost daily. Do cook with wooden turners only and had light scratches might due to the bones. Preheated to really high temp without any problem either. Overall not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jinjin Lou

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This Wok is perfect! Just the right size, very durable and dishwasher safe. Made of great material. I highly recommend this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Marykay Stein

customer_reviews.title: I like this pot
customer_reviews.text: I like this pot, however it was smaller than I wanted. One onion, one bell pepper and one small package of mushrooms and the pan was PACKED! I'm a vegetarian so I kept it so my husband could use it to stir fry chicken and I am going to order the larger 13" wok for general vegetable stir frying. I generally like to toss in broccoli, carrots and other veggies and I can't imagine all that fitting in this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best Wok.
customer_reviews.text: This is plainly the best wok I've had the pleasure of using, right size and balance, nonstick non PFTE, easy clean. Like with any wok cooking the trick is getting it really hot and that is a function of your stove not the wok. Wish I could put a little more flame on it. Have not tried on an electric stove but I suspect that may work better as they can get a pan hotter depending on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Small but works great .
customer_reviews.text: When I received the wok, I was slightly disappointed that it wasnt as large as I wanted it to be . It is quite small in my opinion. The quality of this wok is up to par for the price and it is very light weight( which I love). I find myself reaching for this wok than any other pan. I definitely reccomend you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. It matches our set so it was a no brainer. We have used it many times already.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wow; I love this wok.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wok based on its size and ease of cleaning. This was a great buy and investment!
customer_reviews.author: YOGI-BEAR

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wok
customer_reviews.text: Good pan, easy to clean. I'm not used to cooking in a wok, I think I still need to develop some skills.
customer_reviews.author: Heike Nuhsbaum

customer_reviews.title: A great wok, perfect size for our family...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wok and is perfect size for my family of 3. We make a lot of sauté vegitables, soups and all kinds of other items. We found it very univeral in terms of use and make most of my dinners in it. The non stick coating is very high quality and has life time warranty towards manufacturing defects. I found this "contemporary" series better than most other series in terms of quality. My mom was visiting and she loved it so much, we got one for her as a gift. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mehak

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick wok.
customer_reviews.text: So far -- I've been using it for about three weeks -- it is exactly what I was looking for. Nonstick surface performs beautifully; it's the right weight: it's the right size for a lid that I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Armstrong Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wok!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wok. It is not stick easy to clean and the size is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Winfree

customer_reviews.title: Great wok but wish it had a lid.
customer_reviews.text: Great WOK , just the right size for me. It's non stick flat bottom and easy to clean up. I cook everything in this, vegetables, meat and eggs. Nothing sticks. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it doesn't comne with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Moretti

customer_reviews.title: Great "personal" wok
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a "personal"(just need to cook for myself) wok for a while, hoping to get something cheap for like $20. but this is amazing for the price. very easy to clean, did a sesame chicken sauce in it, and it wipe right off. haven't had it for long, so can't review the durability of it yet, will update if anything goes off in the next month or so.
customer_reviews.author: pheng thao

customer_reviews.title: Narrow bottom
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an old model from Calphalon. The pan is acceptable, but The diameter of the bottom is very narrow such that it doesn’t completely cover the diameter of the smallest burner of our electric stove. Seems like an inefficient design. I probably should have purchased a deep frying pan instead.
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE C

customer_reviews.title: What the size when you order
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for our use. Shipped quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton V.

customer_reviews.title: But It works great and I never had a problem with calphalon products
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of calphalon pots and pans. This one was larger than 12" on the outside diameter which I did not expect. But It works great and I never had a problem with calphalon products.
customer_reviews.author: john nishimura

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wok
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a single person / serving wok but this is a bit bigger. However I like the quality of the wok. I am using it on an electric stove top and I think it would perform better on a gas stove top...
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Fun Wok
customer_reviews.text: It's probably a weird thing to say, but this wok is so cute! I'm used to preparing larger meals. This size makes a perfect meal for two or three. I've recently started cooking healthier stir-fried meals. A spoon of refined coconut oil, a small drizzle of sesame oil, some ginger, and little garlic. Add chopped onion and bell pepper, and some thinly sliced beef. Season with Coconut Secret Amino Soy-Free seasoning, and a little Himalayan pink salt. Our family loves it. Of course there are other stir-fry combinations. This pan just makes it fun to cook it in. It's almost too small for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, Happy with how large it is to cook in, super easy cleanup
customer_reviews.author: Lucy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a couple of months and love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Chef

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Wok for about a month. I cook everyday. The quality of the wok is really good. I was worried that it could like my old one that after a few weeks it starts to get sticky. However, so far there is no change of the performance. The inside surface still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Chaoran

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: we have the small one and seems perfect size for a family of four
customer_reviews.author: MNorth

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very good quality! It's deep, appropriate for Chinese style cooking. And the surface is firm. Have used for months, still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Zhao Wang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stir fry pan
customer_reviews.text: A perfectly sized pan for your stir frying. Pan works perfect, I’ve used it several times already and couldn’t be happier with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My go-to pan. Love it. Super easy to clean. Perfect size. Would be ideal if it came w/a lid. But still, wow. Best buy in the kitchen for me.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Yim

customer_reviews.title: Sized for one or two
customer_reviews.text: I like this for single serving rmeals and it takes a lot less room in the cabinet. Assume it will be as durable as the rest of my Calphalon has been.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy, but great quality.
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy, but great quality and love that it goes in the oven. Could be a little on the small size for some people (depending on portions), so double check the size before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used a Calphalon product in a while (been purchasing cheaper non-stick pans app $20-25). There’s a reason why this costs a little more, totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Doremi

customer_reviews.title: pleased with the nonstick properties
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased two smaller frying pans with the Contemporary Nonstick finish. Since I was happy with those, and I was looking for a wok-type pan, this seemed to fit my need. I have been pleased with the nonstick quality of all three. They heat well and wash easily. Haven't had any of them long enough to speak to how well they last, but anticipate I will be happy with that aspect also.
customer_reviews.author: MO HiSET teacher

customer_reviews.title: really good product. dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: really good product. dishwasher safe. and nonsticky like they say it. wash it and reuse it. cooks dishes very well without burning them. thick base. would last a long time
customer_reviews.author: bAnsIonCal

customer_reviews.title: I really like this wok
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wok. Great size and shape. quality build. Only thing missing is a top but I knew that before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pan
customer_reviews.text: I have bought wok style pans over and over again... I have found that once used they eventually stick... THIS ONE DOES NOT STICK... I'm going to buy a complete set soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I got some pans from the same company for my wedding and I loved them too.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with a cover
customer_reviews.text: A perfectly fine pan, but the product description makes it seem like a domed cover is included. There is no domed cover included in the box. This is from the product description: "The domed cover is perfect for steaming and simmering soups."
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kirkman

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought couple of woks. This is the best ever. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: JIN

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great. A little on the small side, but otherwise perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Superior design and quality. One of the best pieces we have bought in our lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get hot enough to achieve the results I wanted. And, because its shape makes it awkward to store, it's always in the way. This gives me an ever present reminder of its mediocrity.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Love Calphalon products. They are durable and great cookware. This is a great wok. I use it for stir frying and scrambling eggs. I did not rate it’s weight, because I do not like thin cookware.
customer_reviews.author: R L Washington

customer_reviews.title: I have many of their pans and love them.
customer_reviews.text: Typical Calphalon pan which does what it claims. I have many of their pans and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Albert L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice Wok. Light to use and easy to clean...we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, works great. Do not buy a lid from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, absolutely love it. A pain to clean the outside if some oli comes out and comes back to the fire, but i couldnt ask for a better wok. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Good pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great. I do wish that I’d gotten the larger size, and that it came with a lid. But I’ve been quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: 30somethingCT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best in its class. I use it to grill/sear too. Food doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Namrood

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! My daughter has made pad Thai and other delicious dinners . Fairly large, very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wok - can hardly tell it's not new after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Used mine a few times a month for past 6 months and works great. I use all bamboo utensils and almost no sign of wear. Easy to clean, great searing at high heat, couldn't ask for more. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: David Lovrien

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for one person cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is the third of these i have bought. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Kamrowski

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wok that the bottom fit the eye of my standard glass top oven. It's perfect. Great quality and feels substantial. Cooks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Feed 2-4 people
customer_reviews.text: Great to fix a meal for 2-4 people. Good quality, nice weight.
customer_reviews.author: V. Older

customer_reviews.title: Looks so pretty and steady
customer_reviews.text: Just revceived it today and tried it out. The dish cooked with it was very tasty. I love the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great nonstick wok
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the 10" one for about 9 months, it's still working pretty good and being nonstick. Four star because it did not come with a lid. But overall, it's a good wok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality and PFOA free.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a flat bottom wok and this fit my needs. 10-inch is the right size for me. This wok is a little heavier, I assume it's better built quality. The handle is nice to hold. The coating material is superb, not like other cheap teflon. It says Lifetime Warranty but I doubt they would honor if the coating wear off over time. Overall I'm really happy with this wok knowing it's PFOA free.
customer_reviews.author: Amz2000

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but good size anyway so kept it
customer_reviews.text: Cooked everything quick and evenly. Smaller than expected but good size anyway so kept it.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaSun21

customer_reviews.title: You Can't Go Wrong With Caphalon
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Caphalon. The wok is out latest addition to our kitchen essentials. It's easy to clean and cooking with it is easy and problem-free.
customer_reviews.author: PapaCarl

customer_reviews.title: Best smaller size wok
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light, the weight makes it very easy to cook, unlike traditional woks that are heavy and bulky. It is also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: lululoo

customer_reviews.title: This product is labeled as a 10" wok. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is labeled as a 10" wok. It measures 11". SO...it will NOT fit the 10" lid I also ordered from Amazon that advertized it would fit it. UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lattan-Shaw

customer_reviews.title: I will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for stir fry vegetables, easy to clean, good for pan fry tofu and dumplings, but it’s heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Beng Beh

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pan. I love all Calphalon products. And the size is just right for a small family - 10". Great quality. If you make stir fry food, you must have this pan in your kitchen! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mila A.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for! You’ll love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most amazing consumer products I’ve ever bought. And I have bought three of them!
customer_reviews.author: A. Laidlaw

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Heats food well and keeps it warm when turning stove heat down to simmer without turning food to mush.
customer_reviews.author: Naes Nelom

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THE "FREQUENTLY BOUGHT" LID
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: The lid offered as "frequently bought together" does not fit this wok. It is to small. This is really annoying. I like the wok. Wish I had a lid that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alford A Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: Actually 10.75" diameter at the rim
customer_reviews.text: Though the pan says 10" on its bottom, it is actually 10.75" at the rim. The 10" cover doesn't fit. Other than that...nice pan. Just wish it had a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Decent but smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It is great material but just smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: John Paul Allton

customer_reviews.title: 10.5" Calphalon 1877054 stir fry pan
customer_reviews.text: I really like the non-stick quality of the pan itself - I've used it several times & it heats well, and can be preheated in the oven to get it really smokin' hot before starting. It cleans up great. The pan measures 10.5 & my 10" lid falls inside. The hole for hanging it by the handle is a horizontal oval. A real pain. I solve the problem by running a stainless steel beaded key chain thru the hole so I can hang it up on a sturdy hook.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit Talker2

customer_reviews.title: but it does clean very easily, and it does a very good job of ...
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is just a wok, but it does clean very easily, and it does a very good job of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works.
customer_reviews.text: Its a pan! It works. One of the 4 essential cooking pots/pans you will need. It works. Buy this one instead of the larger size. It takes up less space on stove top.

customer_reviews.text: Lasts about a year and a half on a daily usage. Great for stir fry but the non stick eventually wears off.

customer_reviews.text: Quality. This wok is everything and more than I thought it would be. Great product. Thank you for the great cooking experience.

customer_reviews.title: 10" Calphalon Stir Fry
customer_reviews.text: I love this Stir Fry pan. The size is a bit larger than expected, but it is definitely one of my go-to pans. Calphalon is my favorite nonstick cookware. The surface is very long lasting and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new wok!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and just the right size to make stir fry for 2! Love it!

product_meta.title: Calphalon 1877054 Contemporary Hard-Anodized Aluminum Nonstick Cookware, Flat-Bottom Wok, 10-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Size:10-inch| Style Name:WokFeaturing a hard anodized exterior and nonstick interior. Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick combines durability and performance with fast clean up and easy low fat cooking. Heavy gauge aluminum construction ensures even heating and is hard anodized for durability. It also makes it dishwasher safe. Interior includes three layers of nonstick coating – two layers provide durability and the third layer offers easy release performance. The long, brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop. Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish. Adapted from a traditional round bottom wok, this flat bottom wok has a wide cooking surface ideal for stir frying on gas or electric ranges. The domed cover is perfect for steaming and simmering soups. The nonstick surface means you can cook healthier using less fat, with effortless cleanup. Comes with Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.

The long, brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stove top; Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish
